第3章

Chapter 3

1.摘自爱德华·休姆斯著《垃圾学：我们与垃圾的肮脏爱情故事》（纽约：企鹅出版社，2013 年），第 128 页。

1. Quoted in Edward Humes, Garbology: Our Dirty Love Affair with Trash (New York: Penguin, 2013), 128.

2. John Hoffman，《翻垃圾桶的艺术与科学》（华盛顿州汤森港：Loompanics，1993 年），130。

2. John Hoffman, The Art & Science of Dumpster Diving (Port Townsend, WA: Loompanics, 1993), 130.

3. Michelle Slatalla 和 Joshua Quittner，《欺骗大师：统治网络空间的团伙》（纽约：HarperCollins，1995 年），第 6 页，http://archive.org/details/mastersofdecepti00slat。

3. Michelle Slatalla and Joshua Quittner, Masters of Deception: The Gang That Ruled Cyberspace (New York: HarperCollins, 1995), 6, http://archive.org/details/mastersofdecepti00slat.

4.Slatalla和 Quittner，7。

4. Slatalla and Quittner, 7.

5. John Reynolds，《摧毁电话公司》，《电话电子线路 2》，第 5 期（1975 年 5 月），http://pdf.textfiles.com/zines/TEL/tel-07.pdf；A. Ben Dump，《面向大众的计算：一种曲折的方法》，《TAP》，1980 年 2 月；Spenser Michaels，《费城故事，第 1 部分》，《TAP》，1982 年 8 月，http://www.textfiles.com/tap/issue.76/tap7602.jpg；Fred Steinbeck，《胡言乱语》，《TAP》，1982 年 11 月，http://www.textfiles.com/tap/issue.79/tap7903.jpg；The Kid & Co. 和 The Shadow，《更多关于摧毁电话公司的信息：要注意什么，如何行动，去哪里》，2600：《黑客季刊》 1，第 1 期。 9 (1984 年 9 月)，http://textfiles.com/phreak/TRASHING/trash.phk；“关于‘捡垃圾’的一些想法”，2600：《黑客季刊》，1984 年 2 月；Grifter，“翻垃圾桶：一个人的垃圾……”档案，Textfiles.com，2002 年，http://web.textfiles.com/hacking/dumpster_diving.txt。

18.万斯·帕卡德，《隐藏的说客》（伦敦：朗文格林出版公司，1957 年）。

18. Vance Packard, The Hidden Persuaders (London: Longmans, Green & Company, 1957).

19. “伯内斯受雇于迪克西杯公司，推销一次性塑料杯，他将满溢的杯子形象与潜意识中的阴道和性病形象联系起来……”艾伦·比尔顿，《无声电影喜剧与美国文化》（纽约：施普林格出版社，2013 年），第 16 页。然而，我们应该在这里发出警告。二十世纪早期的迪克西杯是纸质的，而不是塑料的。此外，比尔顿在这里没有引用来源。话虽如此，迪克西杯的营销目标是比“共用”杯子（如汽水店的杯子）更卫生，而他们在 20 世纪 20 年代到 30 年代的广告形象确实暗示了死亡和疾病（如果不是潜意识中的阴道形象）。请参阅“III：‘谨防公共饮水杯’——改革与对公共饮水杯的攻击”，Disposable America（博客），2015 年 12 月 8 日，https: //disposableamerica.org/course-projects/a-wholesome-drink/section-iii-beware-the-common-drinking-cup-progressive-reform-and-the-assault-on-the-common-drinking-cup/ 。

19. “Bernays was paid by Dixie Cups to promote the sales of disposable plastic cups, and he did so by linking the imagery of an overflowing cup with subliminal images of vaginas and venereal diseases . . .” Alan Bilton, Silent Film Comedy and American Culture (New York: Springer, 2013), 16. However, we should sound a note of caution here. Early twentieth-century Dixie Cups were paper, not plastic. Moreover, Bilton does not cite a source here. That said, Dixie Cups were specifically marketed as more sanitary than “shared” cups, like those at a soda fountain, and the imagery of their advertising in the 1920s through ’30s does suggest death and disease (if not subliminal images of vaginas). See “III: ‘Beware the Common Drinking Cup’—Reform and the Assault on the Common Drinking Cup,” Disposable America (blog), December 8, 2015, https://disposableamerica.org/course-projects/a-wholesome-drink/section-iii-beware-the-common-drinking-cup-progressive-reform-and-the-assault-on-the-common-drinking-cup/.

20. “VI：‘苏打水机不应成为‘细菌交换所’——苏打水机、餐馆和快餐’”，Disposable America（博客），2015 年 12 月 8 日，https: //disposableamerica.org/course-projects/a-wholesome-drink/section-vi-no-soda-喷泉需要成为细菌交换中心-苏打水喷泉餐厅和快餐/。

20. “VI: ‘No Soda Fountain Needs to Be a “Germ Exchange”’—Soda Fountains, Restaurants, and Fast Food,” Disposable America (blog), December 8, 2015, https://disposableamerica.org/course-projects/a-wholesome-drink/section-vi-no-soda-fountain-needs-to-be-a-germ-exchange-soda-fountains-restaurants-and-fast-food/.

52.马修·基尔申鲍姆 (Matthew Kirschenbaum) 对信息实质性和数字取证的分析表明，真正删除数据非常困难。可以使用磁力显微镜直接从硬盘驱动器中恢复数据，即使是被砸碎或烧毁的硬盘驱动器也是如此。请参阅 Matthew G. Kirschenbaum，《机制：新媒体和取证想象力》（马萨诸塞州剑桥：麻省理工学院出版社，2012 年），第 1 章。

52. Matthew Kirschenbaum’s analysis of materiality of information and digital forensics demonstrates the difficulty of truly deleting data. Data can be recovered using Magnetic Force Microscopy directly from hard drives—even ones that have been smashed or burned. See Matthew G. Kirschenbaum, Mechanisms: New Media and the Forensic Imagination (Cambridge, MA: MIT Press, 2012), chap. 1.

53. Johnny Long, No Tech Hacking: A Guide to Social Engineering, Dumpster Diving, and Shoulder Surfing ed. Scott Pinzon (Rockland, MA: Syngress, 2008), 121.

第四章

Chapter 4

1. Christopher Hadnagy，《社会工程学：人类黑客的科学》。第二版。（印第安纳波利斯：Wiley，2018 年），4–6。

1. Christopher Hadnagy, Social Engineering: The Science of Human Hacking. 2nd ed. (Indianapolis: Wiley, 2018), 4–6.

2. Edward L. Bernays, Crystallizing Public Opinion (1923), chap. 5.

3.Dual Core 的“Trust Me”是 Social-Engineer.org 播客第 13 集的主题曲：https://www.social-engineer.org/podcast/episode-013-social-engineering-the-hustle/。

20. Larry Tye，《公共关系之父：爱德华·伯内斯与公共关系的诞生》（纽约：亨利·霍尔特，2006年），第25页。

20. Larry Tye, The Father of Spin: Edward L. Bernays and the Birth of Public Relations (New York: Henry Holt, 2006), 25.

21.Tye，24–27。

21. Tye, 24–27.

22。“自由火炬”运动如今在公共关系史学家中已成为传奇，他们经常声称该运动促使女性吸烟并打破了禁止女性在公共场合吸烟的禁忌。然而，正如凡妮莎·默弗里 (Vanessa Murphree) 所说，该运动并没有像人们通常声称的那样打破禁忌，也没有取得那么大的成功。首先，她发现很少有报纸报道该活动，其次，在 1929 年的活动之前，女性已经在公共场合吸烟多年。参见凡妮莎·默弗里 (Vanessa Murphree)，“爱德华·伯内斯 1929 年‘自由火炬’游行：神话与历史意义”，美国新闻学32，第 3 期（2015 年 7 月 3 日）：258–281，https://doi.org/10.1080/08821127.2015.1064681。

22. The “Torches of Freedom” campaign is now legendary among historians of public relations, who often claim that it caused women to smoke and smashed a taboo against their smoking in public. However, as Vanessa Murphree argues, the campaign was not as taboo-smashing, nor as successful, as is often claimed. First, she finds that few newspapers reported on the event, and, second, that women had been smoking publicly for years prior to the 1929 event. See Vanessa Murphree, “Edward Bernays’s 1929 ‘Torches of Freedom’ March: Myths and Historical Significance,” American Journalism 32, no. 3 (July 3, 2015): 258–281, https://doi.org/10.1080/08821127.2015.1064681.

23.Murphree，277。

23. Murphree, 277.

24 . Doris E. Fleischman，《公共关系与消费者》，发表于纽约时尚集团，1935年10月30日，第4页。

24. Doris E. Fleischman, “Public Relations and the Consumer,” presented at the Fashion Group, New York, October 30, 1935, 4.

25. Scott M. Cutlip，《看不见的力量：公共关系史》（新泽西州希尔斯代尔：劳伦斯·埃尔鲍姆，1994 年）。

25. Scott M. Cutlip, The Unseen Power: Public Relations, A History (Hillsdale, NJ: Lawrence Erlbaum, 1994).

60.乔纳森·利特曼，《逃亡游戏：与凯文·米特尼克在线对决》（波士顿：小布朗出版社，1997 年），第 247 页。

60. Jonathan Littman, The Fugitive Game: Online with Kevin Mitnick (Boston: Little, Brown, 1997), 247.

61。这张照片是 Steven Levy 的一篇文章的配文，题为“黑客案例”，《新闻周刊》，1995 年 2 月 6 日。我们找到了这张照片的档案副本。虽然这张照片有点令人讨厌，在《新闻周刊》的稳重布局中模仿了 1990 年代《连线》杂志的后现代美学，但利特曼对这张照片的描述令人费解。利特曼将下村描述为以“佛像姿势”坐着。他可能更准确地被描述为盘腿而坐，正如他自己在回忆录中所描述的那样（Shimomura 和 Markoff，Takedown，132）。利特曼称他为“战士”。下村可能也会拒绝这种框架，因为他认为自己的审美是一名加州轮滑和滑雪爱好者——事实上，在照片中，他穿着 T 恤和短裤，他在采访和《Takedown》中的口头禅也可能是“我想回去滑雪” (Goodell，《网络窃贼和武士》，316，321)。尽管我们已经看过利特曼所描述的照片的几份重印本，但我们根本没看到“武士的剑”。

61. The picture accompanies a story by Steven Levy, “The Case for Hackers,” Newsweek, February 6, 1995. We have found an archival copy of this photo. While the picture is a bit obnoxious, aping the postmodern aesthetic of 1990s-era Wired magazine within the sedate layout of Newsweek, Littman’s description of the picture is baffling. Littman describes Shimomura as sitting in a “Buddha pose.” He might be better described as sitting cross-legged, as he himself describes it in his memoir (Shimomura and Markoff, Takedown, 132). Littman refers to him as a “warrior.” Shimomura might also reject that framing, since the aesthetic he attributed to himself was as a California rollerblading and skiing bum—indeed, in the photo he’s wearing a t-shirt and shorts, and his catchphrase in interviews and in Takedown may as well have been “I wanted to get back to skiing” (Goodell, The Cyberthief and the Samurai, 316, 321.) And while we’ve looked at several reprints of the photo Littman is describing, we simply don’t see “the sword of a samurai.”

62.利特曼，《逃亡游戏》，257。

62. Littman, The Fugitive Game, 257.

63.利特曼，244。

63. Littman, 244.

64. “风景大道”，Takedown，1995年，http://www.takedown.com/evidence/transcripts/best.html。

64. “Scenic Drive,” Takedown, 1995, http://www.takedown.com/evidence/transcripts/best.html.

65.米特尼克和西蒙，《电线里的幽灵》，274。

65. Mitnick and Simon, Ghost in the Wires, 274.

66.米特尼克和西蒙，275。

66. Mitnick and Simon, 275.

67.Mitnick和Simon，276–277。

67. Mitnick and Simon, 276–277.

68。事实上，许多新闻报道肯定会刊登米特尼克在两人见面的事先安排的听证会上对下村的认可：“你好，Tsutomu，”米特尼克说。“我尊重你的技能。”

68. Indeed, many news stories were sure to print Mitnick’s acknowledgment of Shimomura when the two met at prearrangement hearing: “Hello, Tsutomu,” Mitnick said. “I respect your skills.”

69. Jessa Lingel，《调整边界：双性恋传递和酷儿理论》，《双性恋杂志》第 9 卷，第 3-4 期（2009 年）：397，https://doi.org/10.1080/15299710903316646。

69. Jessa Lingel, “Adjusting the Borders: Bisexual Passing and Queer Theory,” Journal of Bisexuality 9, no. 3–4 (2009): 397, https://doi.org/10.1080/15299710903316646.

70. Steven D. Brown，《米歇尔·塞雷：科学、翻译和寄生虫的逻辑》，《理论、文化与社会》 19，第 3 期（2002 年）：16，https://doi.org/10.1177/026327602401081503。

70. Steven D. Brown, “Michel Serres: Science, Translation and the Logic of the Parasite,” Theory, Culture & Society 19, no. 3 (2002): 16, https://doi.org/10.1177/026327602401081503.

71 . Karen Lee Ashcraft 和 Brenda J. Allen，“组织沟通的种族基础”，传播理论13，第 1 期（2003 年）：26，https://doi.org/10.1111/j.1468-2885.2003.tb00280.x。

71. Karen Lee Ashcraft and Brenda J. Allen, “The Racial Foundation of Organizational Communication,” Communication Theory 13, no. 1 (2003): 26, https://doi.org/10.1111/j.1468-2885.2003.tb00280.x.

72.从 Sharon Conheady 的“渗透测试人员的社会工程学”第 43 分钟开始，该演讲于 2018 年 10 月 3 日在比利时根特的 BruCON 安全会议上发表，视频，1:02:23，https://www.youtube.com/watch ?v=oAJ1pNJnJHQ 。

72. Starting around the 43-minute mark of Sharon Conheady, “Social Engineering for Penetration Testers,” presented at BruCON Security Conference, Ghent, Belgium, October 3, 2018, video, 1:02:23, https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oAJ1pNJnJHQ.

73. Sue Curry Jansen，《语义暴政：爱德华·伯内斯如何窃取沃尔特·李普曼的魔力并逍遥法外以及它为何仍然重要》，《国际传播学杂志》第7期（2013年4月30日）：1103页。

73. Sue Curry Jansen, “Semantic Tyranny: How Edward L. Bernays Stole Walter Lippmann’s Mojo and Got Away With It and Why It Still Matters,” International Journal of Communication 7 (April 30, 2013): 1103.

74.在《公众舆论》（纽约：Harcourt，Brace，1922 年）一书中，沃尔特·李普曼 (Walter Lippmann) 使用了亨利·福特 (Henry Ford) 举办的著名大熔炉仪式的例子，移民们会穿上代表其原籍国的典型服装，爬进一个巨大的熔炉里，然后从熔炉里出来，“戴着圆顶礼帽，穿着外套、裤子、背心、硬领和圆点领带，……一起唱着星条旗”。

74. In Public Opinion (New York: Harcourt, Brace, 1922), Walter Lippmann uses the famous example of the Melting Pot ceremony, put on by Henry Ford, where immigrants would dress in garb stereotypical of their countries of origin, climb into a giant pot, and emerge from the pot “dressed in derby hats, coats, pants, vest, stiff collar and polka-dot tie, . . . and all singing the Star-Spangled Banner.”

75. Bernays，《结晶公众舆论》，第5章。

75. Bernays, Crystallizing Public Opinion, chap. 5.

76.伯内斯，《公众舆论的结晶》。

76. Bernays, Crystallizing Public Opinion.

77.伯内斯。

77. Bernays.

34。Autovon，第 8 页。事实上，在《电话爆炸》（纽约：Grove，2014 年）中，Phil Lapsley 报告称，John Draper 使用验证来监视他的一位（即将成为前女友的）以及旧金山的 FBI 外地办事处。在《逃犯游戏》中，Jonathan Littman 描述了 Kevin Mitnick、Lewis De Payne 和 Eric Heinz 对 SAS 的迷恋，SAS 是一种“自动化计算机测试系统……[可以] 窃听任何人的电话或数据线。”Jonathan Littman，《逃犯游戏：与 Kevin Mitnick 一起在线》（波士顿：Little，Brown，1997 年），第 24 页。

34. Autovon, 8. Indeed, in Exploding the Phone (New York: Grove, 2014), Phil Lapsley reports that John Draper used verification to spy on one of his (soon-to-be-ex) girlfriends as well as the FBI’s field office in San Francisco. In The Fugitive Game, Jonathan Littman describes Kevin Mitnick, Lewis De Payne, and Eric Heinz’s fascination with SAS, an “automated computerized test system that . . . [can] wiretap anybody’s phone or data line.” Jonathan Littman, The Fugitive Game: Online with Kevin Mitnick (Boston: Little, Brown, 1997), 24.

40.有关艾维·李对“事实”与情感诉求等其他说服手段的立场，请参阅 Scott M. Cutlip 著《看不见的力量：公共关系史》（新泽西州希尔斯代尔：劳伦斯·埃尔鲍姆出版社，1994 年），第 63 页。有关我们声称大众社会工程师没有将他们的工作称为“胡说八道”的例外情况，请参阅 John Martin Campbell 著《在韩国实施欺骗：心理战历险记》（阿尔伯克基：新墨西哥大学出版社，2010 年）。

54. Cutlip，《看不见的力量》，120–123。

54. Cutlip, The Unseen Power, 120–123.

55.我们在此的观点与宣传和公共关系学者 Cory Wimberly 的观点相呼应。Wimberly 认为，我们所谓的大规模社会工程学与真相和谎言关系不大，而更关心言论、行动或事件的影响。无论真假，那些能有效塑造公众舆论的言论、行动或事件都受到重视。没有做到这一点的言论、行动或事件则不被重视。参见 Cory Wimberly，《宣传如何成为公共关系》，第 162 页。

55. Our argument here echoes that of Cory Wimberly, a scholar of propaganda and public relations. Wimberly argues that what we’re calling mass social engineering was less concerned with truth and lies and more concerned with the effects of statements, actions, or events. Statements, actions, or event that effectively shaped public opinion—whether true or not—were valued. Any that did not, were not. See Cory Wimberly, How Propaganda Became Public Relations, 162.

56. Hallahan，《艾维·李与洛克菲勒家族对1913-1914年科罗拉多煤矿罢工的回应》，第269页。

56. Hallahan, “Ivy Lee and the Rockefellers’ Response to the 1913–1914 Colorado Coal Strike,” 269.

57. Cutlip，《看不见的力量》，45页。

57. Cutlip, The Unseen Power, 45.

58.乔纳森·奥尔巴赫，《民主的武器：宣传、进步主义和美国公众舆论》（巴尔的摩：约翰霍普金斯大学出版社，2015年），第137页。

58. Jonathan Auerbach, Weapons of Democracy: Propaganda, Progressivism, and American Public Opinion (Baltimore: Johns Hopkins University Press, 2015), 137.

59. Edward L. Bernays，“Torches-031710”，SpectorPR，2010 年，视频，6:29，https://www.youtube.com/watch? time_continue=299&v=6pyyP2chM8k&feature=emb_logo 。

59. Edward L. Bernays, “Torches-031710,” SpectorPR, 2010, video, 6:29, https://www.youtube.com/watch?time_continue=299&v=6pyyP2chM8k&feature=emb_logo.

60.伯内斯，“火炬-031710”。

60. Bernays, “Torches-031710.”

Fleischman and the Beginnings of Public Relations,” American Journalism 16, no. 2 (April 1, 1999): 85–111, https://doi.org/10.1080/08821127.1999.10739176.; Margot Opdycke Lamme, “Outside the Prickly Nest: Revisiting Doris Fleischman,” American Journalism 24, no. 3 (July 1, 2007): 85–107, https://doi.org/10.1080/08821127.2007.10678080.

64. Henry, “‘There Is Nothing in This Profession . . . That a Woman Cannot Do,’” 100.

62. Edward L. Bernays，“国家政策的营销：战争宣传研究”，《市场营销杂志》第 6 卷，第 3 期（1942 年）：239，https://doi.org/10.1177/002224294200600303。

63. Edward L. Bernays，“同意的工程”，《美国政治和社会科学院年鉴》第 250 卷，第 1 期（1947 年 3 月），119–120，https://doi.org/10.1177/000271624725000116。

63. Edward L. Bernays, “The Engineering of Consent,” The ANNALS of the American Academy of Political and Social Science 250, no. 1 (March 1947), 119–120, https://doi.org/10.1177/000271624725000116.

64 . Ghislain Thibault，“针与子弹：媒体理论、医学和宣传，1910–1940”，载《地方病：传染理论论文集》，Kari Nixon 和 Lorenzo Servitje 编（伦敦：Palgrave Macmillan，2016 年），第 67–92 页，https://doi.org/10.1057/978-1-137-52141-5_4。我们应该注意到，专业传播学者之间已经就早期传播理论家在多大程度上认同“魔弹”或“注射针”理论（该理论认为能够直接影响受众）展开了争论。这场争论似乎已经得到解决，有利于以下论点：从来没有存在过被称为“魔弹”或“注射针”的正式理论。虽然可能没有正式的理论，但渗透性隐喻确实被大量使用，以谈论大众说服对受众产生直接影响的潜力。有关此辩论的进一步讨论，请参阅：Jeffrey L. Bineham，“大众传播中的皮下注射模式的历史叙述”，Communication Monographs 55，no. 3（1988 年 9 月）：230–246，https://doi.org/10.1080/03637758809376169；J. Michael Sproule，“进步宣传批评家和魔力子弹神话”，Critical Studies in Mass Communication 6，no. 3（1989 年 9 月）：225–246，https: //doi.org/10.1080/15295038909366750 ；布奇，《公民观众》，16，118。

64. Ghislain Thibault, “Needles and Bullets: Media Theory, Medicine, and Propaganda, 1910–1940,” in Endemic: Essays in Contagion Theory, eds. Kari Nixon and Lorenzo Servitje (London: Palgrave Macmillan, 2016), 67–92, https://doi.org/10.1057/978-1-137-52141-5_4. We should note that there has been a decades-long debate among professional scholars of communication about the degree to which early communication theorists subscribed to a “magic bullet” or “hypodermic needle” theory that posited the ability to achieve direct effects on audiences. The debate seems to have been resolved in favor of the argument that no formal theory identified as “magic bullet” or “hypodermic needle” ever existed. While there may not have been a formal theory, there was certainly significant use of penetration metaphors to talk about the potential for mass persuasion to achieve direct effects on audiences. For further discussion of this debate, see: Jeffrey L. Bineham, “A Historical Account of the Hypodermic Model in Mass Communication,” Communication Monographs 55, no. 3 (September 1988): 230–246, https://doi.org/10.1080/03637758809376169; J. Michael Sproule, “Progressive Propaganda Critics and the Magic Bullet Myth,” Critical Studies in Mass Communication 6, no. 3 (September 1989): 225–246, https://doi.org/10.1080/15295038909366750; Butsch, The Citizen Audience, 16, 118.

65. Christopher Simpson, Science of Coercion: Communication Research and Psychological Warfare, 1945–1960 (New York: Oxford University Press, 1994), 62; Also see Butsch, The Citizen Audience, 123–124.

第7章

Chapter 7

1.克里斯托弗·怀利（Christopher Wylie），《Mindf*ck：剑桥分析公司和破坏美国的阴谋》（纽约：兰登书屋，2019 年），第 16 页。

1. Christopher Wylie, Mindf*ck: Cambridge Analytica and the Plot to Break America (New York: Random House, 2019), 16.

2. Edward L. Bernays，《人类工程学与社会适应》，《ETC：普通语义学评论》 74，第 3-4 期（2017 年 7 月）：第 346-351 页。

2. Edward L. Bernays, “Human Engineering and Social Adjustment,” ETC: A Review of General Semantics 74, no. 3–4 (July 2017): 346–351.

3. Patrick B. O'Sullivan 和 Caleb T. Carr，“大众人际传播：弥合大众人际鸿沟的模型”，《新媒体与社会》 20，第 3 期（2018 年 3 月 1 日）：1164，https://doi.org/10.1177/1461444816686104。

3. Patrick B. O’Sullivan and Caleb T. Carr, “Masspersonal Communication: A Model Bridging the Mass-Interpersonal Divide,” New Media & Society 20, no. 3 (March 1, 2018): 1164, https://doi.org/10.1177/1461444816686104.

4 . 这并不是说没有其他同样具有操纵性、不道德甚至可能造成损害的沟通实践。再次重申，我们的目标是阐明此类沟通的新兴形式：大规模个人社会工程。

4. This is not to suggest that there aren’t other communicative practices that are also manipulative, unethical, and even potentially damaging. Again, our goal here is to explicate the emergent form of such communication: masspersonal social engineering.

第八章

Chapter 8

1. Max Fisher，“俄罗斯黑客在媒体中发现现成的扩音器”，纽约时报，2017 年 1 月 8 日，https: //www.nytimes.com/2017/01/08/world/europe/russian-hackers-find-ready-bullhorns-in-the-media.html 。

1. Max Fisher, “Russian Hackers Find Ready Bullhorns in the Media,” New York Times, January 8, 2017, https://www.nytimes.com/2017/01/08/world/europe/russian-hackers-find-ready-bullhorns-in-the-media.html.

2 . Emma Briant、David Karpf 和 A​​ram Sinnreich，《超越剑桥分析公司：2020 年的微目标定位和在线活动》，Zoom 小组讨论，2020 年 9 月 2 日，https://www.eventbrite.com/x/117304758691/。具体来说，Briant 认为剑桥分析公司式的目标定位，尤其是使用恐惧诉求，在塑造个人政治观点方面越来越有效。Karpf 更担心监管问题和彻底的选民压制。在政治信息传递方面，Karpf 认为大众信息传递更有效。

2. Emma Briant, David Karpf, and Aram Sinnreich, “Beyond Cambridge Analytica: Microtargeting and Online Campaigns in 2020,” Zoom panel discussion, September 2, 2020, https://www.eventbrite.com/x/117304758691/. Specifically, Briant argued that Cambridge Analytica–style targeting, particularly using fear appeals, is increasingly effective in shaping individual political opinions. Karpf was more concerned about regulatory problems and outright voter suppression. When it came to political messaging, Karpf argued that mass messaging is more effective.

3. Megan French 和 Natalya N. Bazarova，“有人在那儿吗？：通过对社交媒体平台的响应期望来理解大众传播沟通”，《计算机中介传播杂志》第 22 卷，第 6 期（2017 年）：第 303–319 页。

3. Megan French and Natalya N. Bazarova, “Is Anybody out There?: Understanding Masspersonal Communication through Expectations for Response across Social Media Platforms,” Journal of Computer-Mediated Communication 22, no. 6 (2017): 303–319.

4. Patrick B. O'Sullivan 和 Caleb T. Carr，“大众人际传播：弥合大众人际鸿沟的模型”，《新媒体与社会》 20，第 3 期（2018 年 3 月 1 日）：1161–1180 页，https://doi.org/10.1177/1461444816686104。

4. Patrick B. O’Sullivan and Caleb T. Carr, “Masspersonal Communication: A Model Bridging the Mass-Interpersonal Divide,” New Media & Society 20, no. 3 (March 1, 2018): 1161–1180, https://doi.org/10.1177/1461444816686104.

14 . Miles Parks，“佛罗里达州州长称俄罗斯黑客于 2016 年入侵了两个县”，NPR.org，2019 年 5 月 14 日，https://www.npr.org/2019/05/14/723215498/florida-州长称俄罗斯黑客于 2016 年入侵了佛罗里达州的两个县。我们应该注意到，佛罗里达州投票机遭到黑客攻击是借助社会工程攻击进行的，具体来说是鱼叉式网络钓鱼攻击，其借口是来自合法第三方供应商的电子邮件。

14. Miles Parks, “Florida Governor Says Russian Hackers Breached 2 Counties in 2016,” NPR.org, May 14, 2019, https://www.npr.org/2019/05/14/723215498/florida-governor-says-russian-hackers-breached-two-florida-counties-in-2016. We should note that the hack of voting machines in Florida was aided by a social engineering attack, specifically a spear-phishing attack, with the pretext of emailing from a legitimate third-party vendor.

55. Christopher Wylie, Mindf*ck: Cambridge Analytica and the Plot to Break America (New York: Random House, 2019), 65. Note that this sounds remarkably like contemporary economic theory, which sees an economy as an emergent property of aggregated individuals’ utility-maximising demand curves.
